tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VIPGuests (
  guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_name VARCHAR(50),
  guest_email VARCHAR(100),
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  seat_number INT,
  event_attended VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE attendance_tracking (
   guest_id INT,
   event_date DATE,
   check_in_time TIME,
   check_out_time TIME,
   FOREIGN KEY (guest_id) REFERENCES vip_guests(guest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VIP_Guests (
    guest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    guest_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    guest_category VARCHAR(20),
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    seating_table_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance_Log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id UUID,
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    check_out_time TIMESTAMP,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Seats (
    seat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    seat_row INT NOT NULL,
    seat_number INT NOT NULL,
    is_vip BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE GuestsAttendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id INT REFERENCES Guests(guest_id),
    event_id INT REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    seat_id INT REFERENCES Seats(seat_id),
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
